sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Grid, Container, Segment } from 'semantic-ui-react'

export default class MoresInformations extends React.Component {
    render() {
        return (
            <Container>
                <Segment textAlign='center'>Les Informations à charger</Segment>
                <Grid columns={4} divided>
                    <Grid.Row>
                        <Grid.Column>
                            <Segment textAlign='center'>Carnet de vaccination</Segment>
                            <input
                                type="file"
                                id="file"
                                onChange={this.props.onChangeCarnetVaccination}
                            />
                        </Grid.Column>
                        <Grid.Column>
                            <Segment textAlign='center'>Carte national ou passport</Segment>
                            <input
                                type="file"
                                id="file"
                                onChange={this.props.onChangePassport}
                            />
                        </Grid.Column>
                        <Grid.Column>
                            <Segment textAlign='center'>Carte Vital</Segment>
                            <input
                                type="file"
                                id="file"
                                onChange={this.props.onChangeCarteVital}
                            />
                        </Grid.Column>
                        <Grid.Column>
                            <Segment textAlign='center'>CV</Segment>
                            <input
                                type="file"
                                id="file"
                                onChange={this.props.onChangeCV}
                            />
                        </Grid.Column>
                    </Grid.Row>
                    <Grid.Row>
                        <Grid.Column>
                            <Segment textAlign='center'>Permis de conduire</Segment>
                            <input
                                type="file"
                                id="file"
                                onChange={this.props.onChangePermis}
                            />
                        </Grid.Column>
                        <Grid.Column>
                            <Segment textAlign='center'>Assurance automobile</Segment>
                            <input
                                type="file"
                                id="file"
                                onChange={this.props.onChangeAutomobile}
                            />
                        </Grid.Column>
                        <Grid.Column>
                            <Segment textAlign='center'>Photo</Segment>
                            <input
                                type="file"
                                id="file"
                                onChange={this.props.onChangePhoto}
                            />
                        </Grid.Column>
                        <Grid.Column>
                            <Segment textAlign='center'>RIB</Segment>
                            <input
                                type="file"
                                id="file"
                                onChange={this.props.onChangeRIB}
                            />
                        </Grid.Column>
                    </Grid.Row>
                </Grid>
            </Container>
        )
    }

}
